author: Gary 'gaz' Regan
description: Rich and indeed sophisticated, this Scotch-based drink has a zing of ginger spice with a zest of citrus from the garnish.
name: Debonair
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
